body: What's the frequency of the crash， If it's not very high， I recommend you wait for the version 0.20.0 in which we have fixed the crash.
@yxping  review and  check the PullRequest
LGTM
Last 7 Days, 996 Users with 1140 crash reported. We can wait for the version. Do you have any timeline for the same for 0.20.0. A rough estimate even.

I wrote that example, but I know it will not render the same result on web and native (both Android and iOS). That's because Weex does not fully support all features of CSS border corners. Maybe I should remove it from the playground app...

This "little" feature will take amount of works to achieve it, because of the platfrom difference between Android, iOS, and Web. We are evaluating it now.

Similar reason with #1683 , there are many platfrom gaps to implement thi `box-shadow`. However, this example works well on my phone (Android 8, Weex 0.19.0+), I think we already fixed it. The new playground app is on the way, you can try it later in the higher SDK version.

The log looks unreadable... But I found one line in it:

`ReferenceError: Can't find variable: process`

The `process` variable only exist on Node.js platform, you should replace or trim it at build time. Please check you build script or remove the usage of the `process`.
@xuyouyang ok, thanks very much!
谢谢回复
http://dotwe.org/vue/8693c53216ac667d482316d0a8212db8
got the same problem
@Hanks10100 使用weex create 模板创建之后使用的WeekSDK是0.19.0的版本会导致页面无法渲染，我在pod中将WeexSDK 改成0.18.0.3之后，页面就能渲染出来了
@qzcsgs 将podfile文件中WeexSDK版本改成pod 'WeexSDK','~> 0.18.0.3'应该就可以
@weenta 将podfile文件中WeexSDK版本改成pod 'WeexSDK','~> 0.18.0.3'应该就可以
果然改了后就可以正常渲染了，多谢了 @allen2437

> @qzcsgs 将podfile文件中WeexSDK版本改成pod 'WeexSDK','~> 0.18.0.3'应该就可以

非常感谢，出问题的版本为0.19.0，修改为0.18.0.3就解决了。再次感谢。

@KimCongMax  0.19.0.2已修复
implementation 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.4:release@aar'

you can use the code below:
implementation 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.4:release@aar'
and you will get another issue about jacoco when you compiling.
but, 
implementation 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.4:debug@aar'
runs well

直接原生写个navigatorPro模块，加个原生方法就可以了吧
@myeveryheart 一样，只能用debug版本
@Hanks10100 现在IOS的Weex Playground被升级了不能使用，官方除了删打包文件里的process，有没有什么解决方法啊

releaseCompile 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.4:release@aar'
    debugCompile 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.4:debug@aar'

关于路由跳转，rn 社区处理的也很不优雅，react-navigation 第三方模块还在试验阶段。微信小程序页面跳转机制用起来就很方便，weex 可以借鉴把这个功能做到内核里，暴露一个全局对象，主要就提供几个 api

- weex.navigateTo()  跳转某个页面，往路由栈添加一条信息；
- weex.redirectTo()   重定向到某个页面，删除路由栈中信息；
- ........
感觉weex 已经凉了  研究react-native去吧

nobody？？？

这个问题原因是你直接引入此库中的android-sdk源码，其中的build.gradle中有三行
`    delete 'libs/armeabi/libweexcore.so'
    delete 'libs/armeabi-v7a/libweexcore.so'
    delete 'libs/x86/libweexcore.so'`
已经将libweexcore.so 给删了，而后是通过直接编译出新的so。图简单的话，可以直接在[此路径中](https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=incubator-weex.git;a=tree;f=android/sdk/libs;h=b32a7a5dbb58048c5d6d22785fdc06260d984537;hb=HEAD)将最近的匹配平台的so下载下来引入，并且注释上述三行代码，避免再次被删除

同问，用release版本的aar会直接崩溃，报错如下
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Failed resolution of: Lorg/jacoco/agent/rt/internal_b0d6a23/Offline;

@foyel @qzcsgs The official `webpack` configuration has been updated, and the `process .env.NODE_ENV` variable will be automatically replaced. You can re-run the `weex create` command to create a template and put `configs` folder (which has some webpack config files) into your old project to replace the old configuration.
